text: Need of Outdoors
Pawns are encouraged to fulfill their need of outdoors by seeking recreation outdoors
NOTE: Don't place the same joy giving sources both indoors and outdoors, to avoid indecisiveness.
Opportunistic jobs
Pawns are encouraged to clean the room before operating a station in it
NOTE: Don't expect pawns who cannot clean to suddenly begin cleaning.
Calculate accurate path to the building for bill jobs
It'll help to avoid making unreasonable hooks around when your pawns need to bring resources first, but it may be costly on CPU
Pawns are encouraged to clean the room after tending to a patient
NOTE: Don't expect pawns who cannot clean to suddenly begin cleaning.
Meal stacking
Pawns avoid mixing negative thoughts when stacking meals
That way pawns will never mix disgusting meals with normal ones
Count odd meat (ex.: insect) as normal, allowing to stack it with normal meals
Insect meat isn't so bad...
Meal generation
Add random ingredients to randomly generated meals
Ex.: gifted by story teller, sold by a trader, looted from corpse. Only mood neutral components are used. With this option on, the game will never be the same
Add former task to queue
That way pawns will not change their mind after performing an opportunistic task, but sometimes it can cause confusion if a job was already taken
Pawns are encouraged to haul ingredients for a bill to a stockpile
When working on a bill, pawns will prefer hauling ingredients to a stockpile, instead of taking a small fraction, required for a recipe
Fulfillment of needs
Pawns are encouraged to take account of potential mood in drug policies
Pawns will not use drugs if "potential" mood is above a limit, preventing overuse of drugs to achieve a set mood level.
Miscellaneous
Recipes display complete list of ingredients
Instead of just vague "ingredients"
Advanced behaviors
Pawns will clean rooms in between hauling ingredients and crafting
Basic behavior would let them clean only before hauling
Pawns are encouraged to pick up all ingredients before hauling them to the crafting place
Pawns will take all necessary ingredients to their hauling inventory before delivering them to the crafting place
Pawns are encouraged to use ingredients and materials that are closer to spoiling.
WARNING: A large amount of items to choose from may cause lag when this option is enabled.
Unload
Cancel unload
Enable a button in colonist's inventory to mark items for hauling to stockpile
If there are no stockpiles to haul to, the colonist will drop the item near him
Pawns will put items back in their inventory when interrupted
When pawns are holding an inventory item in their hands, they'll put them back if action was interrupted
Pawns will stop taking more sweets than they can eat
No more chocolate lying around
Category
Pawns are encouraged to fulfill secondary needs during joy assignment, or if woken early
Pawns will try to top off their joy need only after it goes below 80%, they'll prefer to pick up a spare meal to their inventory, and fulfill all their hygiene needs (if dubs mod is present)
Tweakable numbers (0 = Unlimited)
Filth limit for pre-task cleaning
Filth limit for pre-bill cleaning
Filth limit for post-tending cleaning
Pawns are discouraged from clearing snow from areas when it's snowing or raining
When raining just in case if it's a tricky weather
Pawns are encouraged to eat meals that are closer to spoiling
WARNING: A large amount of items to choose from may cause lag when this option is enabled.
Allow and encourage pawns to feed animals with hay.
Animals will also be encouraged to prefer non-human food.
Pawns are encouraged to give allowed social drugs or joy-giving food to sick pawns
Why talk if you can give them a chocolate bar?
Change how pawns use drugs when relaxing socially to prevent them from "wasting joy"
Normally pawns sit down for a hour or two before actually consuming the drug, wasting the effect
Pawns are encouraged to clean before eating at a table or relaxing socially
Pawns will clean around the table where they're planning to sit
Pawn's mood slowly moves towards 50% while they're asleep if possible
Just let pawns "sleep on it" and they should be fine
Pawns are encouraged to avoid bad weather when wandering aimlessly
Just stop walking out into the toxic fallout, you idiots
Pathing
Any friendly pawns are encouraged to avoid wandering into bedrooms, prison cells and prison barracks
This is just indecent or even dangerous, isn't it?
Allow to take any drugs from inventory
If it's ingestible, it should be possible to eat it without dropping on the ground
Clean around this bench
Pawns will clean around this bench
Pawns will NOT clean around this bench
Show a toggle to be able switch which benches need cleaning
It will be possible to disable cleaning around some benches
Pawns will meditate only as much as they need
Unless under meditation assignment, pawns will stop meditating if their psyfocus is full and they don't see meditation as a good source of joy (i. e. full or bored of it)
-- pawns will not exceed inventory capacity
For immersion reasons or whatever
Optimal Patching

When this option is off, all options activate immediately after toggling them, at the cost of always being in the code, possibly affecting performance even if they're toggled off. When option is on, options will require you to restart the game when changed, but patches needed for these options won't happen, removing extra performance impact when game launches with these options toggled off
ATTENTION: Optimal patching doesn't properly apply without restarting the game!
